thumb.title: 電気子羊 (Electric Lamb) / 足立レイ
thumb.description: ⚡🐑🧡忘れ去られた、時代遅れの、そして神様の迷い、漂い、道を踏み外した羊たちへの頌歌。曲、歌詞、ギター、MIX、調声、絵、MV：‪@yumigurumi‬ MV手伝い：@Shauntaro‬ Vocal：Adachi Rei ARPA ENGBacking Vocal：Kasane Teto SVDAW：Ableton Live 12動画編集：Da Vinci Resolve 18歌詞：https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1V96u0gute7IuZsy2E0FUsJYhT0XqXcTBSMSqZsGBgSo/editThank you to the countless people with whom I pestered with so many WIPs of this piece over the last few months - off the top of my head, ‪KuriCovers‬ helping with the mix, Maqo for all their thoughts during composition, as well as for help with Esperanto pronunciation, ‪indeterminant‬ for reviewing the instrumentation, ‪Shauntaro‬ for help editing, timing, & rendering the MV (Da Vinci wouldn't have cooperated with me otherwise), and キルスタ(Kilsturgeon) for reviewing the Japanese translation, among others. And, of course, thank you to all of the Adachi Rei fans, artists, and songwriters out there whose work inspired me to create this piece! Let's continue to make 2025 a wonderful year.
